choices.D: FortiGate used 209.222.147.3 as the initial server to validate its contract.
choices.A: FortiGate will probe 121.111.236.179 every fifteen minutes for a response.
choices.C: Servers with a negative TZ value are experiencing a service outage.
choices.B: Servers with the D flag are considered to be down.

discussion.content:
A and D(typo in IP, assuming it should be 209.222.147.36)
B- incorrect. Flag 'D' denotes 'Default' (IP addresses from DNS resolution)
C- incorrect. TZ denotes timezone offset from this firewall

questions.question_text: An administrator has decreased all the TCP session timers to optimize the FortiGate memory usage. However, after the changes, one network application started to have problems. During the troubleshooting, the administrator noticed that the FortiGate deletes the sessions after the clients send the SYN packets, and before the arrival of the SYN/ACKs. When the SYN/ACK packets arrive to the FortiGate, the unit has already deleted the respective sessions. Which TCP session timer must be increased to fix this problem?

choices.D: Choose a matching algorithm based on available memory and the type of inspection being performed.
choices.B: Downloads signatures on demand from FDS based on scanning requirements.
choices.A: Determines the optimal number of IPS engines required based on system load.
choices.C: Determines when it is secure enough to stop scanning session traffic.

questions.question_text: The CLI command set intelligent-mode <enable | disable> controls the IPS engine's adaptive scanning behavior. Which of the following statements describes IPS adaptive scanning?

discussion.content: no more "set intelligent-mode" in FortiOS 7.0 CLI guide..

C is Correct

Selected Answer: A

choices.C: Incomplete commands are ignored in CLI scripts.
choices.A: Commands that start with the # sign are not executed.
choices.B: CLI scripts will add objects only if they are referenced by policies.
choices.D: Static routes can only be added using TCL scripts.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer. Local gw should be changed to incoming proposal's config.

Selected Answer: D
D is the answer
It is funny because neither CBC nor the hash functions are used for authentication. As in the CLI output visible, authentication is done via Preshared Key.

choices.D: Change phase 1 encryption to 3DES and authentication to SHA256.
choices.B: Change phase 1 encryption to 3DES and authentication to CBC.
choices.A: Change phase 1 encryption to AESCBC and authentication to SHA128.
choices.C: Change phase 1 encryption to AES128 and authentication to SHA512.
